facet.name: subscribe
facet.description: Facet permitting subscription to and unsubscription from pubsub messages generated by the application.

action.name: info
action.description: Retrieve a description of the application.

action.name: subscribe
action.description: Subscribe to pubsub messages from the application.

parameter.name: hub.callback
parameter.description: The URL to post each message to as it arrives.

parameter.name: hub.topic
parameter.description: A filter for selecting a subset of messages. Each kind of hub interprets this parameter differently.

parameter.name: hub.verify
parameter.description: Either 'sync' or 'async'; the subscription verification mode for this request. See the PubSubHubBub spec.

parameter.name: hub.verify_token
parameter.description: Subscriber-provided opaque token. See the PubSubHubBub spec.

parameter.name: hub.lease_seconds
parameter.description: Subscriber-provided lease duration request, in seconds. See the PubSubHubBub spec.

parameter.name: hub.callback
parameter.description: The URL that was used to subscribe.

parameter.name: hub.topic
parameter.description: The filter that was used to subscribe.

parameter.name: hub.verify
parameter.description: Either 'sync' or 'async'; the subscription verification mode for this request. See the PubSubHubBub spec.

parameter.name: hub.verify_token
parameter.description: Subscriber-provided opaque token. See the PubSubHubBub spec.

parameter.name: hub.lease_seconds
parameter.description: Subscriber-provided lease duration request, in seconds. See the PubSubHubBub spec.
